meta.title: Adrien Petitjean - Web developer
meta.keywords: Adrien Petitjean, web developer, software engineer
aboutMeParagraph:
👋 My name is Adrien, and I am a web developer.
I started my journey in 2008, and since then I have witnessed significant evolution in the web industry.

I have had the opportunity to work with various technologies, and currently, I work for Unity technologies as a Senior Fullstack developer.

I enjoy all aspects of web development and am always eager to learn new things!

Check out my complete professional experience on LinkedIn.

I would be happy to chat with you, so please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
myWorkDiv:
My work

Here is a list of recent projects I have been involved in and 💛 working on during my personal time.

  • MyMedium posts
  • A template to createAWS Lambdas with Typescript.
  • The website ofEmma Roussel Naturopath.
  • Bigfile: An executable that identifies large files on your system.
  • Zippy: An archiver made with Electron JS.
  • Some code pen projects
  • And this website made with next js.

You can explore all my work on myGitHub account.

Stay tuned for more exciting projects!
